name: Secrets of Grindea
description: A fantasy Action RPG, playable by yourself or in co-op with up to three friends! Features an unrestricted skill system, fluid and challenging combat, and an engaging story. For additional value, there's also a fleshed out, challenging roguelike mode to truly put your ARPG skills to the test!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: Dual-core processor (Intel Dual Core 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 5200+ 2.6 GHz) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
